analysis: Market analysis indicates strong upward momentum with multiple bullish confirmations. RSI at 11.37 signals oversold conditions, potential reversal opportunity. Money Flow Index at 13.38 shows extreme selling pressure. MACD histogram negative with bearish crossover in effect. Price trading below Bollinger lower band, indicating potential oversold bounce. Technical structure favors downside with price below key support levels. Ichimoku structure confirms bearish environment. Stochastic at 14.06 signals potential reversal from oversold levels.

indicator_insights.rsi: Deeply oversold at 11.4, strong reversal potential. Buyers may step in soon.
indicator_insights.mfi: Severe money outflow at 13.4, capitulation phase. Contrarian opportunity.
indicator_insights.stochastic: Extreme oversold at 14.1, bullish divergence watch active.
indicator_insights.macd: Strong bearish momentum. Histogram expanding negative (-0.00142), downtrend intact.
indicator_insights.bollinger_bands: Price squeezed below lower band. Mean reversion expected, oversold bounce likely.
indicator_insights.moving_average: Price 1.25% below MA. Downtrend confirmed, MA acting as dynamic resistance.
indicator_insights.parabolic_sar: SAR positioned above price at 0.80062. Downtrend active, short positions favored.
indicator_insights.ichimoku: Price below cloud components. Strong bearish structure, shorts technically favored.
